Text: i should note, that save-states and in-game saves work flawlessly (at least on the emulator that I use and mentioned in the description).
can i play this on the pc ??? and how ???

you can play roms on any emulator. i know there is a genesis plus for pc. may try that. the bin should work with any emulator, but the enhanced audio utilizes the sega/mega-cd add-on emulating both the sega-cd and the genesis to get the enhanced audio.
my suggestion: download genesis plus and this torrent and report your results.
